body:
`hpctoolkit@2020.08.03` isn't building on `RHEL 7` for `x86_64` with `%gcc@8.1.0`

Spack version is `spack@develop` (114317464b578ec9dde5cb4d96b2a114cb0909be, 10-Sep-2020)

Concrete spec: [hpctoolkit-l73vyj.yml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5203665/hpctoolkit-l73vyj.yml.txt)
Build log: [hpctoolkit-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5203673/hpctoolkit-build-out.txt)


```
$> spack mirror add e4s https://cache.e4s.io
$> spack buildcache keys -it
$> spack install --only dependencies --cache-only -f ./hpctoolkit-l73vyj.yml
... OK
$> spack install --only package --no-cache ./hpctoolkit-l73vyj.yml
==> Installing hpctoolkit
==> hpctoolkit: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> hpctoolkit: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> hpctoolkit: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

5 errors found in build log:
     994     make[3]: Entering directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5
             hjsweezu4uhzb3vae45hf/spack-src/src/tool/hpcprof'
     995     /spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../../src/include    -g -O3 -Wall  -falign
             ed-new -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweezu4uhzb3vae45h
             f/spack-src/src -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweezu4uh
             zb3vae45hf/spack-src/src -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/binutils-2.33.1-izngkux
             ufgdc45e2tq7um52xsx75fsoo/include -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xerces-c-3.2.2
             -p3ww4gutrsmgzpzqnnxqwemzfpu5j53f/include  -MT hpcprof_bin-main.o -MD -MP -MF .deps/hpcprof_bin-
             main.Tpo -c -o hpcprof_bin-main.o `test -f 'main.cpp' || echo './'`main.cpp
     996     /spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../../src/include    -g -O3 -Wall  -falign
             ed-new -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweezu4uhzb3vae45h
             f/spack-src/src -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweezu4uh
             zb3vae45hf/spack-src/src -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/binutils-2.33.1-izngkux
             ufgdc45e2tq7um52xsx75fsoo/include -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xerces-c-3.2.2
             -p3ww4gutrsmgzpzqnnxqwemzfpu5j53f/include  -MT hpcprof_bin-Args.o -MD -MP -MF .deps/hpcprof_bin-
             Args.Tpo -c -o hpcprof_bin-Args.o `test -f 'Args.cpp' || echo './'`Args.cpp
     997     mv -f .deps/hpcprof_bin-Args.Tpo .deps/hpcprof_bin-Args.Po
     998     mv -f .deps/hpcprof_bin-main.Tpo .deps/hpcprof_bin-main.Po
     999     /bin/sh ../../../libtool  --tag=CXX   --mode=link /spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -g -O3 -Wall  -fa
             ligned-new -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweezu4uhzb3va
             e45hf/spack-src/src -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5hjsweez
             u4uhzb3vae45hf/spack-src/src -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/binutils-2.33.1-izn
             gkuxufgdc45e2tq7um52xsx75fsoo/include -I/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xerces-c-3
             .2.2-p3ww4gutrsmgzpzqnnxqwemzfpu5j53f/include  -g -O3 -Wall  -faligned-new -L/spack/opt/spack/li
             nux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xerces-c-3.2.2-p3ww4gutrsmgzpzqnnxqwemzfpu5j53f/lib -L/spack/opt/spac
             k/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xz-5.2.5-r4lmrnxdydo6x3s66j3ley6wtffk2k63/lib -llzma  -o hpcprof-
             bin hpcprof_bin-main.o hpcprof_bin-Args.o ../../../src/lib/analysis/libHPCanalysis.la ../../../s
             rc/lib/banal/libHPCbanal_simple.la ../../../src/lib/profxml/libHPCprofxml.la ../../../src/lib/pr
             of/libHPCprof.la ../../../src/lib/binutils/libHPCbinutils.la ../../../src/lib/prof-lean/libHPCpr
             of-lean.la ../../../src/lib/isa/libHPCisa.la -L/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/int
             el-xed-2019.03.01-gnldmyy457xrn7od45q7m7y5jggd4bit/lib -lxed ../../../src/lib/xml/libHPCxml.la .
             ./../../src/lib/support/libHPCsupport.la ../../../src/lib/support-lean/libHPCsupport-lean.la -L/
             spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/elfutils-0.180-i47wfbx2fwrjcdfr7gu42lrdzkkpadf4/lib
              -ldw -lelf /spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/xz-5.2.5-r4lmrnxdydo6x3s66j3ley6wtffk2
             k63/lib/liblzma.a -lxerces-c -lxerces-c /spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/binutils-2
             .33.1-izngkuxufgdc45e2tq7um52xsx75fsoo/lib/libbfd.a /spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.
             0/binutils-2.33.1-izngkuxufgdc45e2tq7um52xsx75fsoo/lib64/libiberty.a -ldl /spack/opt/spack/linux
             -rhel7-x86_64/gcc-8.1.0/zlib-1.2.11-kzcdykxiwmefakdug4fnprjxe4s4g6mj/lib/libz.a -lm
  >> 1000    libtool:   error: cannot find the library '/opt/software/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-8.1.0-
             nvf2cslf7osh2mug4f26sf3u6kegqvf7/lib/../lib64/libstdc++.la' or unhandled argument '/opt/software
             /linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-8.1.0-nvf2cslf7osh2mug4f26sf3u6kegqvf7/lib/../lib64/libstdc++.
             la'
  >> 1001    make[3]: *** [hpcprof-bin] Error 1
     1002    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5h
             jsweezu4uhzb3vae45hf/spack-src/src/tool/hpcprof'
  >> 1003    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1004    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5h
             jsweezu4uhzb3vae45hf/spack-src/src/tool'
  >> 1005    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1006    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hpctoolkit-2020.08.03-r224phfjkj5h
             jsweezu4uhzb3vae45hf/spack-src/src'
  >> 1007    make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
```

@mwkrentel @shahzebsiddiqui
title: Installation issue: hpctoolkit on RHEL 7
